timelineCards.title: Full Stack Developer (Front-End) - Cherry Advertising
timelineCards.description: Working as a Full Stack Front-End developer for an agency. I joined an agency because i enjoy building products from scratch and being from the start of a project to the finish.

timelineCards.title: Front-End Contractor - Sussex Peasant
timelineCards.description: I wanted to improve my skills further while working for ATD, I worked as a contractor on the evenings. This was a website build for a popup resturant that sells farm produce.

timelineCards.title: Full Stack Developer - ATD
timelineCards.description: I worked as a Full Stack Developer for an Ecommerce company for nearly 3 years. I joined as a junior developer but quickly after 8 months became a mid-weight developer. I learnt a lot of new skills including Drupal and various dev opps tasks. I was also was part of the CRO team, so i was responsible for creating new features and implementing the features that passed the CRO tests onto the website.

timelineCards.title: Front-End Contractor - NPS
timelineCards.description: I worked as a front-end deveveloper on a 3 weeks contract to help a parking company build a new website. This was my first job outside of University. I learnt a lot during the 3 weeks, got experience with a real client and upped my skills in HTML, CSS and Javascript.

timelineCards.title: Graduated from University
timelineCards.description: I Graduate from Leeds with a BSc in Computing and a MSc in Software Engineering
